explanatory.question: Why is [person_1] stand up?
answer: [person_1] is playing a solo with the electric bass guitar.

predictive.question: What is [person_1] going to do?
answer: [person_1] is going to stop play the lute.
reason: [person_1] showed the snake and kept stepping forward.

counterfactual.question: What will happen if [person_1] isn't here?
answer: All the people around will stretch their hands before he falls down.
It is probable that [person_1] won't be able to walk.
reason: There would be only [person_1] and his partner dancing there.
There would be no one else to replace [person_1] to dance with [person_1].
